How anonymous is DuckDuckGo?
Tired of being tracked online? We can help.
Learn why DuckDuckGo is better than Incognito.
Learn how DuckDuckGo keeps you private.
Customize your app icon
Instantly clear tabs & browsing data
Visit settings to choose a different icon theme.
Simply tap the Fire Button by the address bar.
Show Me
Try It Out
Would you like to Fireproof %s?
Fireproofing this site will keep you signed in after using the Fire Button.
Fireproof
Not now
Websites
Ask When Signing In

Websites rely on cookies to keep you signed in. When you Fireproof a site, cookies won\'t be erased and you\'ll stay signed in, even after using the Fire Button. We still block third-party trackers found on Fireproof websites.
Now tap below to burn your browsing history. Give it a try! 👇

Did you know the Facebook app can make requests for data even when you\'re not using it?

Replace the app with a home screen shortcut that opens Facebook in DuckDuckGo. Then delete the Facebook app.
Add Facebook Shortcut
Not Now
Worried about Facebook tracking you?
Here\'s a simple way to reduce its reach.
Success! %s has been added to your home screen.

Checking your feed in DuckDuckGo is a great alternative to using the Facebook app!

But if the Facebook app is on your phone, it can make requests for data even when you\'re not using it.

Prevent this by deleting it now!
Connection aborted. This website could be harmful to your device.

Heads up! Since %s owns %s, I can\'t stop them from seeing your activity here.

But browse with me, and I can reduce what %s knows about you overall by blocking their trackers on lots of other sites.
Enable device location for DuckDuckGo Privacy Browser?
%s is requesting your device location. You\'ll first need to allow the app to send your device location, then %s can ask permission.
Enable
Maybe Later
Don\'t Ask Again for this Site
Grant %s permission to access location?
You can manage the location access permissions you’ve granted to individual sites in Settings.
Always
Only for this session
Deny always
Deny for this session
Location

Sites you visit may ask to know your device location. They won\'t be able to access it until you explicitly grant permission. DuckDuckGo only uses your location anonymously to deliver local search results.
Sites can ask for my location
No websites granted permission to access location
To manage the location access permissions you\’ve granted to individual sites, enable location for this app in Android Settings.
Location
